snippet.title: A Hat in Time - Seal the Deal Announcement (Gamescom 2018)
snippet.description:
Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/787340/A_Hat_in_Time__Seal_the_Deal/
Get SEAL THE DEAL for free if downloaded on Steam September 13th!
Seal the Deal and the Co-op DLC will be available on September 13th.
A Hat in Time releases on the Nintendo Switch, coming soon!
http://hatintime.com
